 PREV   NEXT FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Treetank 1.0.6-SNAPSHOT API

Packages
org.treetank Root package for all packages.
org.treetank.access Access to Treetank The access semantics is as follows: There can only be a single IDatabase instance per Database-Folder There can only be multiple ISession instances per IDatabase linked uniquely to resources representing concrete data-storages.
org.treetank.access.conf Configuration ofTreetank All configuration of Treetank takes place of the classes in this package.
org.treetank.annotations  
org.treetank.api TreeTank API This package contains the public TreeTank API.
org.treetank.aspects.logging  
org.treetank.cache Implementation for the caches.
org.treetank.exception Exception Layer All exceptions thrown by Treetank are instance of these classes.
org.treetank.io This package represent the interaction of treetank with the backend (namely a file, a berkley-db, a database).
org.treetank.io.berkeley Implementation for the BerkeleyDB as the backend.
org.treetank.io.berkeley.binding Every Binding for storing Treetank data in the berkeley db is given over here.
org.treetank.io.file This package represent the interaction of treetank with the backend (namely a file, a berkley-db, a database).
org.treetank.node Node Page Layer for Treetank Here, all different nodes are listed which are used in Treetank.
org.treetank.node.delegates  
org.treetank.node.interfaces  
org.treetank.page Page Layer for Treetank Contains all page kinds and page utils.
org.treetank.page.delegates  
org.treetank.page.interfaces  
org.treetank.saxon.evaluator Evaluators to simplify Saxon access.
org.treetank.saxon.wrapper Treetank wrappers.
org.treetank.service.jaxrx Root package for all packages.
org.treetank.service.jaxrx.enums Enums for relative access types Used to access relative nodes via URL e.g., for fist child of a resource: http://localhost:8093/treetank/factbook/firstChild()
org.treetank.service.jaxrx.implementation Resource implementation This package contains classes which handles request for database resources and database subresources like in our case: node id support.
org.treetank.service.jaxrx.server Server implementation This package contains classes to configure the in JAX-RX included Jetty server to support a REST layer for the database.
org.treetank.service.jaxrx.util Util classes This package contains util classes for REST resources support.
org.treetank.service.xml Package XML Layer The package xml layer implements all axis iterations for the encoding implemented in the node layer.
org.treetank.service.xml.diff Diff Layer The package diff layer provides mechanisms to compute diffs between two different revisions.
org.treetank.service.xml.diff.algorithm Implementation of diff algorithms.
org.treetank.service.xml.diff.algorithm.fmes Provides the fast match / edit script (FMES) tree to tree correction algorithm as described in "Change detection in hierarchically structured information" by S.
org.treetank.service.xml.diff.in  
org.treetank.service.xml.diff.out Export of diffs.
org.treetank.service.xml.serialize Serializer Package All class in this package are for getting data out of Treetank.
org.treetank.service.xml.shredder Shredder Package All classes in this package are for getting data into Treetank.
org.treetank.service.xml.xpath Package xpath Contains classes for scanning and parsing xpath queries and to build the query evaluation pipeline.
org.treetank.service.xml.xpath.axis  
org.treetank.service.xml.xpath.comparators Package comparators Contains XPath comparators specified in XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Functions and Operators and classes that support their usage.
org.treetank.service.xml.xpath.expr Package Expr Contains all high level XPath expressions.
org.treetank.service.xml.xpath.filter Package filter Contains all additional XPath filters or axis that work like filters.
org.treetank.service.xml.xpath.functions Package functions Contains XPath functions and operators specified in XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Functions and Operators and classes that support their usage.
org.treetank.service.xml.xpath.functions.sequences Package functions on sequences.
org.treetank.service.xml.xpath.operators Package operators Contains XPath operators specified in XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Functions and Operators and classes that support their usage.
org.treetank.service.xml.xpath.parser  
org.treetank.settings Package for all constants and settings including standard settings.
org.treetank.utils Package Utils The package utils contains all small code fragments, tools, configuration, and constants that are used all over the TreeTank project.
